Package tripleplay.gesture

Interface Summary
Gesture<T extends Gesture<T>>  
 

Class Summary
GestureBase<T extends GestureBase<T>> A base class for Gestures to extend to get some common functionality.
GestureDirector Resolves user touch input in terms of a set of Gestures that are registered with this director.
GestureNode A node in the history of the current user gesture.
GestureRegionDirector Handles multiple GestureDirectors listening on a single layer.
Swipe A simple swipe gesture in a given cardinal direction.
Tap A simple touch gesture.
 

Enum Summary
Gesture.Direction  
Gesture.State  
GestureNode.Type
